column5: A charming guest house nestled on a quiet street in historic Lakewood, in East Dallas. Lakewood Shopping Center is a short walk, with Whole Foods, a dozen restaurants, pubs & music. Greenville Avenue is 5-minutes away, with great nightlife. In 10-15 min., you can get to the Downtown Business/ Arts District, Deep Ellum/ Fair Park, or the Knox-Henderson area. Baylor University Medical Center is a 10-min. bus ride and White Rock Lake is only 1.25 miles away.
